full_text: Poland’s president arrived in Kyiv, where he is slated to become the first foreign leader to address the Ukrainian parliament since Russia invaded, as Russian forces continued pressing their eastern offensive https://t.co/yQonh4Obv3

localize.full_text: ポーランド大統領がキエフに到着し、ロシア軍が東方攻撃を続ける中、ロシア侵攻以来初めてウクライナ議会で演説する外国人指導者となる予定だ。https://t.co/yQonh4Obv3。
